planet.name: MOA-2010-BLG-073L b
2MASS J18101138-2631226 b
planet.description: The planet MOA-2010-BLG-073L b was discovered by the Microlensing Observations in Astrophysics (MOA) survey. In a microlensing event like this, the light from a source star is bent and magnified by a foreground star and a planet. In this case the source star was previously known to be photometrically variable.
